title: 024 - The Pod Discusses "The Fart Bag"
description: On today's show, the guys check in with Tone after he walked 40 miles on Thursday/Friday, answer a handful of questions from Twitter, discuss some of the different movies they've been watching during quarantine, chat about old school trip memories, which takes them down a rabbit hole that ultimately ends with a story from Boston Connor about the fart bag. Don't forget to send questions in to @ThePodPMI on Instagram and Twitter, and as always, stay safe out there. Enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
